parameters.name: obj
parameters.description: A pointer to the atomic flag that you want to clear.

parameters.name: order
parameters.description:
(atomic_flag_clear_explicit() only) The
  memory_order
  to use for the operation.

full_content:
Function: atomic_flag_clear_explicit
URL: https://www.qnx.com/developers/docs/7.1/com.qnx.doc.neutrino.lib_ref/topic/a/atomic_flag_clear.html
Synopsis: void atomic_flag_clear_explicit( volatile atomic_flag *obj,
Headers: #include <stdatomic.h>
Parameters:
  - obj: A pointer to the atomic flag that you want to clear.
  - order: (atomic_flag_clear_explicit() only) The
  memory_order
  to use for the operation.
Examples:
Example 1:
#include <stdatomic.h>

void atomic_flag_clear( volatile atomic_flag *obj );

void atomic_flag_clear_explicit( volatile atomic_flag *obj,
                                 memory_order order );
